name: preact-calculator
description: a simple calculator made with preact

scripts.wait-for-server-build: while [ ! -f build/server.js ]; do echo "‚è≥ waiting for server build..." && sleep 1; done
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "yarn run dev:build:client" "yarn run dev:build:server" "yarn run dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: yarn run wait-for-server-build && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --delay 1 --watch build build/server.js
scripts.build: yarn run cleanup && yarn run build:client && yarn run build:server
